name: The Hovering Darkness
description: The Hovering Darkness is a short interactive non linear tale where you need to survive and figure out what is happening. Its essence is inspired by Lovecraft. Although the whole experience takes less than 5 minutes there are 10 possible endings, and somes are pretty hard to get. This is my first game in Twine and the first game that I made alone, in a personal game jam with myself.
